comments: Also describes the location a(n) of the minimal scaling factor when rescaling an FFT of order 2^{n+2} in order to (currently) minimize the arithmetic operation count (Johnson & Frigo, 2007). - Steven G. Johnson (stevenj(AT)math.mit.edu), Dec 27 2006a(n) = 2a(n-1)-a(n-2)+2a(n-3). Sequence is identical to its half second differences from the second term; a(n)+a(n+2)=2^(n+2). - _Paul Curtz_, Dec 17 2007
